data.meanings: small pillows, carpets, anything that is spread on which one can lean or recline.
data.sentence: The word وَزَرَابِيُّ comes from the root ز ر ب and is associated with the meanings: small pillows, carpets, anything that is spread on which one can lean or recline.
The word مَبْثُوثَةٌ comes from the root ب ث ث and is associated with the meanings: spread/dispersed/scattered, published/revealed.
